# Draft:Linn Warme

|draft's talk page]], the WP:THREE best sources that establish notability of the subject. Thanks, Zzz plant (talk) 12:09, 5 September 2025 (UTC)}}
----
Linn Warme (born 1988) is a Swedish illustrator, pattern designer and textile artist. She studied at the HDK – Academy of Design and Crafts in Gothenburg and the Swedish School of Textiles in Borås.
Career
Warme has worked as a print designer for Swedish fashion companies and later established her own studio. Her work combines hand drawing and digital techniques, often with motifs from Scandinavian nature.
Recognition
She was one of three winners of the international FESPA Printeriors design competition in 2018. The municipality of Västerås awarded her a cultural scholarship in 2014.
